value:
Askr's...Order of...Heroes? There are
so many worlds I have not learned
of yet...

It is terrifying to share spaces
with...so many other people.

You don't treat me like you're
better than me... You must be
a nice person.

If there is anything I can do, I will.
Just...don't leave me...

I had a dream that... Er, well...I can't
tell you. It's too embarrassing.

I...am Eitr. I will leave soon. Don't be
angry with me...please.

Wh-what is this? ...I did well?
Do you really mean it?
I must get stronger...
Even here I fall short...

I don't know what will come of it,
but...I must not stay as I am...

I am...Eitr. I serve the nothingness
and the one who rules it... Wh-where
am I now?

I...had a dream I...wanted to tell
you about. It was a scary one, but...
someone was there to save me.$k$pI don't remember their face, but
they were very kind...$k$pI think it could have been you,
since you're always so kind...
But it was just a dream.$k$pAnd of course there is no way
you would know anything about
my dreams... I'm sorry.$k$pEven so, you are kind—that much
is still true.
Forgive me for this…
I...I wish...
Stay!
I can change!
How...could this...
I am...Eitr. I serve the nothingness and the one who rules it...
*yelp* I... Forgive me.
Freyja must not be revived... The Lady of Nightmare cannot live again...
The one who rules the nothingness... I cannot defy.
Do you see me as your foe as well?
Everything is strange... Like a half-remembered dream...
With you beside me, I can allow myself to be at ease...
Of course...
Is this correct?
As you command.
